introduction: Life on the CAPS is the final chapter in Meriem Bennani’s film trilogy of the same name, set in a supernatural, dystopian future surrounding a fictional island in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean. This new work is a result of the artist’s research and reflections on the histories of island societies, biotechnology, and vernacular music.更多详情：https://renaissancesociety.org/exhibitions/546/meriem-bennani-life-on-the-caps/
